name: NATIONAL INDEPENDENT VENUE ASSOCIATION
sampleDescriptions: Discussions regarding COVID-related assistance, including S. 3814 - RESTART Act.
COVID-related assistance. RESTART Act (S.3814 and H.R.7481), and Save Our Stages Act (S.4258 and H.R.7806).
